review: Dr. Karthik, along with his team, provided exceptional care for my mother's total knee replacement surgery. From the initial consultation to the post-operative care, Dr. Karthik demonstrated professionalism, expertise, and genuine compassion. His thorough approach and clear communication instilled confidence in us throughout the entire process. Under his guidance, my mother received the best possible care, and her surgery was successful. I highly recommend Dr. Karthik and his team to anyone in need of orthopedic care, as they truly excellence in their field.

Dr. Karthik is an outstanding orthopedic surgeon known for his exceptional skill and compassionate patient care. With a wealth of experience and a deep understanding of orthopedic conditions, Dr. Karthik is highly regarded within the medical community. Patients consistently praise his thorough explanations of procedures, as well as his ability to listen attentively to their concerns and address them with empathy. Dr. Karthik's surgical precision and dedication to providing personalized treatment plans ensure optimal outcomes for his patients. His commitment to staying abreast of the latest advancements in orthopedic surgery further underscores his dedication to excellence. Dr. Karthik's warm demeanor and unwavering commitment to his patients make him a trusted and respected figure in the field of orthopedic surgery. My husband has been so much better after he came here to him!

review: My experience with the Doctor was excellent. He was friendly and listen to my problems very patiently. He prescribes minimum medicine  and does not recommend tests just for the sake of it. Overall a very pleasant and a good experience.
